amendment.description: Amendment sought to change the name of the bill to the Russian Energy Reliance and U.S. Poverty Act.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in Part F of House Report 116-200 to change the name of the bill to the Russian Energy Reliance and U.S. Poverty Act.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Gosar amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 161 - 272 (Roll no. 522).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Gosar amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 161 - 272 (Roll no. 522).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A002) offered by Mr. Gosar.
